snippet: JURDEM--Arnold I. Congregation Emanu-El of the City of New York records with deep sorrow the death of our cherished member, Arnold Jurdem. With his family, we share the grief of loss and bereavement. May his memory be a blessing and the beautiful qualities of his life endure. 1/3
lead_paragraph: JURDEM--Arnold I. Congregation Emanu-El of the City of New York records with deep sorrow the death of our cherished member, Arnold Jurdem. With his family, we share the grief of loss and bereavement. May his memory be a blessing and the beautiful qualities of his life endure. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  JURDEM, ARNOLD I
